title: [K-12] Technology-Enhanced Blended Learning for Advanced Critical Thinking Skills Development

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tool usage and foundational knowledge of social studies
context.additional_context: Corporate social education reinforcement program, operated in smartphone-centric limited environments with a focus on formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social issue scenarios and propose critical thinking-based solutions with 80% accuracy
Systematically solve complex social problems with 90% or higher success through communication with peers using collaborative mobile apps
Improve metacognitive skills by recording and executing self-directed learning strategies four or more times through reflective journaling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
